item.title: ‘My Life With The Walter Boys’ Dethroned In Netflix’s Top 10 List By A New Show
item.description: Here's what new show has knocked Wednesday off the #1 spot in Netflix's top 10 list, and it may not be the biggest shock given a recent release.

item.title: Apple iPhone 17 Air: Price And Unexpected Design Change Revealed In New Report
item.description: The new super-slim iPhone has two surprises up its sleeve, according to the latest report.

item.title: Govee TV Backlight 3 Pro Headlines IFA 2025 Launch Bonanza
item.description: Govee has launched a bunch of new smart light devices at the Berlin tech expo.

item.title: Using Psychological Tools To Better Understand Human-AI Relationships
item.description: As AI continues to evolve, understanding the psychological aspects of our interactions with it becomes essential.

item.title: ‘The Office’ Has A Lower Rotten Tomatoes Score Than ‘The Paper’
item.description: The Office's spiritual successor, The Paper, is getting higher scores than the beloved series, at least so far.
